column4: Hello, could anyone help me with troubleshooting acpi please?
ACPI is a very voluminous matter. You better state your specific problem.
Well, i've got 2 gpus on my laptop. I used to boot with i915.modeset=0. Most of the things were unrecognized, like video and display (couldnt go more then 800x600).
I just tried with acpi=off, video works awesome but the temperature problem is messy.
why is this an ACPI problem and no graphics problem?
i was using acpi_call... im just fed up with it all :)
You have a rare bug in so far as ACPI and graphics rarely interfere. I would start by analyzing dmesg. If you cannot find a hint in dmesg, you could try to find a hint in /var/log/Xorg.0.log.old.
thank you. i'll try to dig something up... i think it might be some pci irq thing, but since im using ubuntu for a few months... thanks again.
Yes, a PCI IRQ bug could be the culprit.  I once had such a bug. But this reflected in dmesg.
i did find some switching by ironlake card, "sharing irq 5 with 0000:01:00.0" and then, radeon at 0000:01:00.0 shared irq 5
I do not know if this is a strong hint to a bug. In my case there was a repeated try to establish a sharing of the same IRQ so that an intermittent soperating state arose.
can i post that bit for you, on pastebin or something?
